title: Stage Lv3-P6-S30
description: Level 3 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: On second thought, I think that's right. (variant 1)
learning_points: Level 3 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 다시 생각해보니 그게 맞는 것 같아요. (확장 1)
sentences.en: On second thought, I think that's right. (variant 1)
Actually, I was wrong. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 생각해보니 더 좋은 방법이 있을 것 같아요. (확장 1)
sentences.en: Come to think of it, there might be a better way. (variant 1)
Wait, that's not right. (variant 1)
Let me correct that - it was the day before yesterday, not yesterday. (variant 1)
I've changed my mind. (variant 1)
I'll reconsider it. (variant 1)
I realize now that I made a mistake then. (variant 1)
Oh, then that's a different story. (variant 1)
Then again, I'm not sure. (variant 1)
